info.headline: Freeze Watch issued November 10 at 11:36AM EST until November 12 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. For the Cold Weather Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 20 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 possible.
* WHERE...Inland Levy County.
* WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 8 AM EST Tuesday. For the Cold Weather Advisory, from 2 AM to 9 AM EST Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction:
Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
To prevent water pipes from freezing; wrap or drain or allow them to drip slowly.

parameter.value: FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM EST TUESDAY... ...COLD WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EST TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING
